page.title: 06A NIGHT AT T'CLUB:Sheffield
page.content: The Don Valley, on the east of Sheffield is part of{'Clubland'.}Here in the clubs for working men you can have a drink with your neighbours and enjoy an evenings entertainment on stage. Many well known stars have begun a career in these clubs before moving on to theatre and t.v. fame. {Bingo}is a popular part of a night out at the club _ prizes are offered for the winner of a game where numbers 1-99 are picked at ramdom from a container. The players cover numbers on their cards - all of which are different. The winner is the one to cover all their numbers first. Children love to ride their extra tough{'B.M.X.'}bikes round the local streets or the special tracks provided by the{City Council.
